description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education and knowledge sharing. His work explores internet fragmentation, ecosystem architecture, and innovative approaches to global challenges. He advocates for a diverse, user-driven web and emphasizes practice-based innovation. yeehaa's blog posts and courses cover topics like internet evolution, digital landscapes, and fostering sustainable communities. His approach combines strategic thinking with practical action, encouraging unconventional problem-solving and open knowledge exchange.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends academia and tech to transform education and knowledge sharing. His work explores internet fragmentation and innovative solutions to global challenges, advocating for a diverse, user-driven web.
